code: import React,{useState,useContext}from"react";import{useNavigate,Link}from'react-router-dom';import{AuthContext}from"../context/AuthContext";import{authAPI}from"../services/api";import'./Auth.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const{login}=useContext(AuthContext);const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setLoading(true);setError('');try{const{data}=await authAPI.login(email,password);login(data.user,data.token);navigate('/chat');}catch(err){var _err$response,_err$response$data;setError(((_err$response=err.response)===null||_err$response===void 0?void 0:(_err$response$data=_err$response.data)===null||_err$response$data===void 0?void 0:_err$response$data.message)||'Login failed');}finally{setLoading(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"auth-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"auth-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Chat App - Login"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"error",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",disabled:loading,children:loading?'Loadin...':'Login'})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Don't have an account?
